--- Astroblast / Switchblade / Drag Strip ---

Two missiles smash into Astroblast's front, charring his heavy train 
mode armour, and causing pitts. Four laser blasts returned fire 
through the cover of the smoke left by the missiles. He winced as 
they hit, but continued on, beside the CF. He stopped, his hatch 
opens up, and he waits for Speedbreaker to get out.


Switchblade finishes repairs on Dead-End.


Drag Strip fires two more plasma blasts from his cannons, and 
continues circling Incarcinator.



On 11 May 2001, at 2:30, Jen D. wrote:

> The Galactor jets recieved Zardus's orders and then came around for
> another pass. They saw Astroblast heading for the Cybertronian Fire,
> and set a head-on collision toward him. They approached him quickly,
> though one of them was cloaked and Astroblast wouldn't see it, and
> then fired two missiles each as soon as they were close. Both of them
> pulled up to avoid a collision, but the missiles kept going right at
> Astroblast.
